name: Time selection criteria parameter class codes

entries.description: An indicator that Friday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
entries.comment: In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

entries.description: An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
entries.comment: In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

entries.description: An indicator that there is a preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource.
entries.comment: In component 2, specify any valid time in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation where HH = hour and MM = minutes

entries.description: An indicator that there is a preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource.
entries.comment: In component 2, specify any valid time in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation where HH = hour and MM = minutes

entries.description: An indicator that Saturday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
entries.comment: In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

entries.description: An indicator that Sunday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
entries.comment: In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

entries.description: An indicator that Thursday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
entries.comment: In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

entries.description: An indicator that Tuesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
entries.comment: In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

entries.description: An indicator that Wednesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
entries.comment: In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred
